projects.title: Funcraft
projects.desc: A task tracking gamification application aimed to increase performance and productivity

details.desc: Funcraft is a task tracking gamification aimed to increase performance and productivity. Funcraft was made as a submission for a business case competition by Mandiri Tunas Finance and became a finalist. Funcraft as a Web Application utilizing frameworks such as VueJs, ExpressJs, and MySql.

projects.title: DeText
projects.desc: OCR application made to extract text from images made using tensorflow and flask

details.desc: DeText is an OCR application made to extract text from images. Detext is an application submitted as the GUI for a thesis project involving AI Tech such as CNN, LSTM, and Mask R-CNN. DeText was made using frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, Flask, and Svelte

projects.title: Speed Mail
projects.desc: a Mail client inspired by Speedwagon made using Vue and Mongodb

details.desc: SpeedMail is a Mail client inspired by the anime character Speedwagon from the anime JoJo. Speedmail was made as a submission for a class project to better understand the web tech stack. SpeedMail was made using frameworks such as VueJs, ExpressJs, Bootstrap, and MongoDB.

projects.title: M-Bank
projects.desc: A redesigned BCA m banking application made using C#

details.desc: M-Bank is a redesigned BCA m banking application made using C#. M-Bank was made as a submission for a class project aimed to better understand how to create a desktop GUI application. M-Bank was made using frameworks such as ASP.Net, and SQL Server.

projects.title: Prabu Hotel
projects.desc: a prototype hotel reservation system made using java

details.desc: Prabu Hotel is a prototype hotel reservation system made using java. Prabu Hotel was made as a submission for a class project to better understand ways of implementing OOP. Prabu Hotel was made using frameworks such as Spring Boot, Apache Velocity, Maven, and Oracle DB
